quoteFirst: The disturbances, which are greatest on the declination curve and least on the vertical force curve, lasted in all three for about 12 minutes, and are quite distinct from the ordinary magnetic perturbations. At Parc Saint-Maur, the magnetographs seem to be ill-adapted to act as seismographs, for only a slight mark was discovered on a re-examination of the curves, beginning at
title: A Study of Recent Earthquakes
author: Davison, Charles, 1858-1940

quoteLast: , so I am able to state that the longest night in Russia consists of eighteen hours and three quarters.

quoteFirst: "I continued on a south-westerly course with my light cruisers spread until
quoteLast: Nothing further being sighted, I assumed that the enemy were to the north-westward, and that we had established ourselves well between him and his base. _Minotaur_ (Captain Arthur C. S. H. D'Aeth) was at this time bearing north 5 miles, and I asked her the position of the leading battle squadron of the Battle Fleet.
title: World's War Events, Vol. II
